recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of sweet bread, cubed| Quantity; 6; Prepare 6 eggs| Measurement; 480; Measure out 480 grams of milk| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of sugar| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of vanilla extract| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of cinnamon| Measurement; 28; Measure out 28 grams of butter, melted| Untimed; None; Grease a baking dish with butter| Untimed; None; Arrange bread cubes in the prepared baking dish| Untimed; None; In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla extract, and cinnamon| Untimed; None; Pour the mixture over the bread cubes| Untimed; None; Cover and refrigerate for at least 8 hours or overnight| Untimed; None; Preheat oven to 175 degrees C (350 degrees F)| Timed; 3600; Bake in the preheated oven for 60 minutes| Finish; None; Serve warm!
title: Sweet Bread Strata
